actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage investments in new manufacturing and other productive equipment by allowing an investment tax credit to taxpayers who increase the amount of such investments.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide an investment tax credit for manufacturing and other productive equipment. Provides for determining such credit.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to encourage investments in new manufacturing and other productive equipment by allowing an investment tax credit to taxpayers who increase the amount of such investments.
